skill.name: Heal
skill.description: Heals an ally or himself based on intelligence

skill.name: Light Strike
skill.description: Hits enemy with a magic attack based on intelligence

skill.name: Mace Throw
skill.description: Throws mace at an enemy dealing damage based on strength. If enemy is burning, applies all stats debuff

skill.name: Heal Plus
skill.description: Strengthens Heal giving mana to the targeted ally

skill.name: Light Strike Plus
skill.description: Empowers Light Strike to reduce the magic defense of the enemy by 25% for 2 turns

skill.name: Mace Throw Plus
skill.description: Strengthens Mace Throw making it bounce dealing a total of 3 hits. If enemy is burning, applies all stats debuff

skill.name: Blessing
skill.description: Blessing that heals some health to all allies based on intelligence

skill.name: Harden Skin
skill.description: Hardens skin as tough as stone to gain a big boost to physical defense, intelligence and strength

skill.name: Clarity
skill.description: Purifies party removing all debuffs

skill.name: Kick
skill.description: Physical attack that deals reduced damage based on strength and has a chance to stun the enemy

skill.name: Guard
skill.description: Protects himself or an ally for 1 turn, reducing the taken damage

skill.name: Heavy Slash
skill.description: Deals physical damage based on strength and also 50% chance of bleeding

skill.name: Kick Plus
skill.description: Strengthens Kick attack augmenting the stun chance and lowering enemy physical defense

skill.name: Guard Plus
skill.description: Strengthens Guard reducing even more the taken damage

skill.name: Heavy Slash Plus
skill.description: Strenghtens Heavy Slash attack augmenting the damage dealt, 50% chance of bleeding and lowering the enemy physical defense

skill.name: Charge
skill.description: Attack with high priority that charges through an enemy dealing damage based on strength and reducing judgement

skill.name: Taunt
skill.description: Has a chance to provoke all enemies forcing them to focus him for 1 turn

skill.name: Whirlwind
skill.description: Sword spining attack that deals damage to all enemies based on strength

skill.name: H. Axe
skill.description: Physical attack that deals extra damage to stunned enemies

skill.name: Morale Boost
skill.description: Small boost to strength and intelligence for 2 turns on an ally

skill.name: Dwarfs Wrath
skill.description: Lowers remaining health by half boosting dexterity for 2 turns

skill.name: High Axe Plus
skill.description: Strengthens Double Edged Axe to deal 3 attacks. Deals extra damage to stunned enemies

skill.name: Morale Boost Plus
skill.description: Strengthens Morale Boost making it last for 3 turns

skill.name: Dwarfs Wrath Plus
skill.description: Strengthens Dwarfs Wrath boosting even more dexterity and lasting 3 turns

skill.name: Raging Mock
skill.description: Anger enemy decreasing its judgement, strength and intelligence for 3 turns

skill.name: Meteor
skill.description: Throws enormous rock to an enemy and also hits adjacent positions with big physical damage. If enemy is stunned, deals damage * 1.5

skill.name: Counter
skill.description: The Dwarf gets ready for the next attacks and protects from all the damage this turn while reflecting back some of the damage too

skill.name: Blizzard
skill.description: Calls forth a strong blizzard that deals damage in area based on intelligence and lowers all enemies agility

skill.name: Seed Of Life
skill.description: Casts 2 magic life balls that heal an ally or damage an enemy based on intelligence

skill.name: Fireball
skill.description: Big fire spell that hits 2 enemies with damage based on intelligence and has a chance to burn them. If enemy stunned, deals damage * 1.5

skill.name: Lightning Boolt
skill.description: Strikes an enemy with an electrical attack based on intelligence that has a chance to stun them

skill.name: Seed Of Life Plus
skill.description: Empowers Seeds of Life to throw a 3rd life ball

skill.name: Fireball Plus
skill.description: Empowers Fireball to deal greater damaga and have a higher chance to burn enemies. If enemy stunned, deals damage * 1.5

skill.name: Lightning Boolt Plus
skill.description: Strenghtens Lightning Bolt to deal higher damage and increase the chance to stun

skill.name: Revive
skill.description: Casts a powerfull spell to bring back from the dead an ally with a small amount of health

skill.name: Fire Djinn
skill.description: Summons the Fire Djiin to deal damage based on intelligence and burns an enemy
